Invocation upon hearing a dog barking in.ARABIC_TEXT: ((إِذَا سَمِعْتُمْ نُبَاحَ الْكِلاَبِ وَنَهِيقَ الْحَمِيرِ بِاللَّيْلِ فَتَعَوَّذُوا بِاللَّهِ مِنْهُنَّ؛ فَإِنَّهُنَّ يَرَيْنَ مَا لاَ تَرَوْنَ)).
Invocation upon hearing a dog barking in.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (If you hear the barking of dogs or the braying of asses at night, seek refuge in Allah for they see what you do not.)
